title.rendered: Latest PHP Web Development Trends That Will Dominate In 2024

content.rendered:
The year 2020 witnessed a number of changes and updates in the web development domain. The spectrum of PHP web development is broad enough to know that it will exist for a long time (PHP covers over 50% of the world’s websites, after all).

PHP has always faced criticism from developers, with some defining it as crappy, mediocre, and outdated. While all updates to PHP since version 7 has seen tremendous improvements, most developers don’t see PHP going toe-to-toe with other programming languages.

In the same way, PHP web development also has been, for a while getting stale and in need of a major change.

Some big companies namely; PayTM Mall, Swiggy, CureFit, Zomato, Byju, PolicyBazaar, and Dream11 grew significantly using PHP frameworks. But what about 2020? What changes can we expect to see in PHP development in the year coming ahead?

PHP Web Development Trends

1) Integration of PHP and Cloud to Build Web Apps

Businesses are investing more than ever before in creating cloud infrastructure. Reports by Canalys state that the global cloud infrastructure services market grew by 37% in Q3 2019, accumulating to a valuation of US $27.5 Billion. 

According to another survey, 78.9% of the websites use PHP server-side programming language and Cloud to obtain the benefits of both technologies. This proactive approach will help them by offering a cost-effective, scalable, and flexible web solution.

2) User Interface Trends for PHP Web Development

The receptive web is another important PHP web development trend for the user interface. Website of social networks like Twitter, Facebook, emails, and even e-commerce websites such as Amazon, eBay, etc. are the most visited website that people search on their mobile phones. In order to make them more convenient for the user and offer the best experience, website owners must ensure that websites are responsive.

With the availability of so many PHP web development tools and frameworks, you can easily develop a wide range of applications and websites according to the requirements of your web development. You can use some of the popular PHP frameworks for website development such as Codeigniter, CakePHP, and Symfony.

Infographics, online presentations, and visual effects are other growing trends that keep the user engaged with your website. Flash is also used to create a 3D interaction that can be games or banner ads. The header bar is used to express the services that are offered. Parallax scrolling is another game-changing trend that is used to provide images and banners with a 3D effect.

3) PHP Web Development Tools and IoT Go Well Together

PHP web development tools are essentially a complex virtual structure of distinctive technologies and IoT technology is a virtual structure of three distinct layers that needs a dynamic language that helps improve the overall coding structure. The PHP frameworks such as Laravel, Symfony, and Codeigniter are better adapted to IoT development requirements that make it the best solution possible.

PHP web development and IoT together come around as the best support for app developers as they both will create new ways for app users to explore the digital world like never before.

The latest PHP 7 allows web developers to easily access asynchronous programming that allows PHP code to easily perform multiple tasks in a single script. To create your business applications as per your business requirements hire PHP developers who can deliver you the best results to fulfill your needs. 

Also Read: PHP Is Incredibly Better Than Its Other Alternatives For Web Projects

 

4) PHP to Improve Cybersecurity of Your Website

With PHP development tools, you can implement robust cybersecurity solutions to secure your website and web applications. It is because a gradual change has been seen in the style of shopping today. People start to prefer online shopping instead of wandering here and there in the local market. This trend of online shopping has changed the use of cash for the use of credit/debit cards and mobile wallets. 

Google Wallet, Amazon Pay, and PayPal are some popular mobile wallets that are commonly used by people. If the application/website of your business is an application/website based on mobile commerce, you must also integrate a type of payment gateway for your online users.

You can choose the right PHP framework such as Phalcon which is a well-documented PHP framework for asset management, security, and caching. Or, you can go for Codeigniter which is a lightweight PHP framework to add the best encryption features to your website.

Also Read: Why Laravel Is The Best PHP Framework

5) PHP to Create Smart Chatbots

Source: Google

Undoubtedly, Chatbots are the best example of machine language and artificial intelligence that has gained popularity in recent years. According to the latest trends, PHP tools and frameworks are the best to build a chatbot because PHP is an open-source language that is also easy to use for developers.  

It is an innovative tool that can help you create the best Chatbot for your website in less time. As it has been exclusively good for developing for “Conversation Agents”, it impresses with its scripting language and also there are many libraries available for you to choose from with API.

Example of PHP Coding

Input

<?php

$botman->hears('Hello BotMan!', function($bot) {

   $bot->reply('Hello!');

   $bot->ask('Whats your name?', function($answer, $bot) {

       $bot->say('Welcome '.$answer->getText());

   });

});

$botman->listen();

Famous PHP Frameworks For Web Development

From the below view of famous PHP frameworks, these frameworks are widely used by developers. If I talk about web app development, then these are the renowned PHP Frameworks of 2022.

Laravel

It is one of the famous PHP frameworks in the market today. Laravel enables developers to concentrate on core fundamentals with the PHP server-side programming language. It permits developers to focus on core fundamentals, with even scaling benefits and rapid development with codes.

Laravel KeyFeatures

  • MVC Architecture Support
  • ORM (Object Relational Mapping) Support
  • Artisan available
  • Libraries & Modular
  • Database Migration System

Codeigniter

Source: Google

Codeigniter is a complete set of libraries, tools, and components. It is a PHP MVC-based framework utilized for developing web apps rapidly. This framework provides out-of-the-box libraries for correlating to the database and executing different operations like uploading files, sending emails, managing sessions, etc.

KeyFeatures of Codeigniter

  • Model-View-Controller Based System
  • Full-Featured database classes
  • Query Builder Database Support
  • Form and Data Validation
  • Security and XSS Filtering
  • Session Management
  • Email Sending Class

CakePHP

Source: Google

CakePHP offers an excellent set of libraries that includes helpful components. It is a modern open-source framework that grants a fast application development process to businesses. This framework helps the enterprises to reach highly potent and specific websites by grasping the easy procedure.

CakePHP KeyFeatures

  • MVC architecture support
  • Composer based installer
  • Code generation and scaffolding tools
  • MySQL, Postgres, MSSQL, and SQLite

Yii

Source: Google

Yii is another strong entry in our listing of the best PHP frameworks, and it’s a worthy competitor. Yii and other PHP frameworks permit developers to create a full-fledged web app within a shorter time. This Yii supports CRUDing (creating, reading, updating, and deleting).

Yii KeyFeatures

  • Offer Great Security
  • Highly extensible and advanced technologies
  • Simple installation
  • Extreme acceleration for performance
  • CRUD feature and easy form validation

Growing Outsourcing of PHP Web Development

The entire global IT outsourcing market has been promoted to grow at a significant margin in the future. The main reason is that outsourcing is quite low in costs. That’s why most American and European countries hire PHP development companies in different regions of the world that offer cheaper services. The huge difference in current rates has encouraged this particular trend.

PHP web development trends are highly dynamic. It allows PHP web developers to essentially create dynamic websites easily. Treads is another benefit offered by PHP tools & frameworks.
